thread.section_title: ImmediateAnnuities.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ImmediateAnnuities.com | immediateannuities.com
thread.title: Li Chen

author: Li Chen
title: Li Chen
text:
I found ImmediateAnnuities.com through researching annuity on the internet. The annuity information on their site is very helpful. The annuity calculator is very useful.
I purchased Deferred Income Annuity through ImmediateAnnuities.com. Ariel Stern handled the process professionally. He even got me a better deal before I mailed out the application. I am very satisfied with the service. I'll definitely use their service to purchase annuity again.
